text:
="preserve">Brandon Christopher McCartney (born August 17, 1989), known by his stage name Lil B, is an American rapper. Lil B is also known as The BasedGod.
Career.
When he was 16, he started rapping with the hip hop group The Pack. They released a single called "Vans". Lil B released his first album with The Pack on October 30, 2007.
